name: skyrim-twitch-wheel
description: Twitch-integrated spinning wheel overlay for Skyrim streaming

scripts.install:plugin: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim Special Edition\Data\SKSE\Plugins' -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item 'skse-plugin/x64/Release/OverlayBridge.dll' 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim Special Edition\Data\SKSE\Plugins\OverlayBridge.dll' -Force"
scripts.deploy:skse: npm run build:skse && npm run install:plugin
